melesa barapathala thuwala laba welyaye wati siti wana aliya goda gena prathikara katayuthu aarambha kala dumriye gatimen sharira abhiyantharaye athiwu adhika le wahanaya wima nisa mema wana aliya miya giya bawa girithale wanajiwi karyalaye pashu waidya eekakaya pawasayi.
